How can I get started with Verus Coin, whether it's mining, staking, or just learning more about the community?

You can get started with Verus Coin by visiting the official Verus website and joining the Verus community on Discord. There, you'll find FAQs, helpful community members, and resources to help you get started with mining, staking, or learning more about Verus.

re about Verus Coin? The best place to start is reading the Verus Vision Paper.
Want to get started mining, staking or just joining our very active community? Begin with our official site and the very thriving, welcoming Verus community on Discord, where you’ll also find lots of FAQs and meet many helpful members!
Visit Verus Official Site: https://veruscoin.io
Join the Official Verus Discord: https://discord.gg/VRKMP2S
